Constraint Success.description: NIST-01 - The Value of OBX-1 (Set ID-OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1" within a message or for each group.
IZ-12 - The value of MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL be '|'.
IZ-13 - The value of MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL be '^~\&'.
IZ-TS_Z - The value of MSH-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDDHHMMSS+-ZZZZ.
IZ-17 - The value of MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL be 'VXU^V04^VXU_V04'.
IZ-15 - The value of MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL be '2.5.1'.
IZ-42 - The value of MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'ER'.
IZ-41 - The value of MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'AL'.
IZ-43 - The value of MSH-21[1] (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be 'Z22^CDCPHINVS'.
IZ-5 - The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-6 - The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-5 - The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-6 - The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-5 - The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-6 - The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-17 - The value of MSG.1 (Message Code) SHALL be 'VXU'.
IZ-17 - The value of MSG.2 (Trigger Event) SHALL be 'V04'.
IZ-17 - The value of MSG.3 (Message Structure) SHALL be 'VXU_V04'.
IZ-3 - The value of EI.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-4 - The value of EI.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-46 - The value of PID-1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be '1'.
IZ-TS_NZ - The value of PID-7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
IZ-5 - The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-6 - The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-66 - The value of XPN.7 (Name Type Code) SHALL be 'M'.
IZ-DT_D - The value of PD1-17 (Immunization Registry Status Effective Date) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
IZ-DT_D - The value of PD1-18 (Publicity Code Effective Date) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
IZ-70 - The Value of NK1-1 (Set ID-NK1) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1".

IZ-24 -  If RXA-20 is valued 'CP' or 'PA' and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 is valued '00' and RXA-5.1 is valued with a CVX code from table PHVS_VISVaccines_IIS (See Appendix A) then for each vaccine information statement that was shared there SHALL be:[one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '69764-9' (bar coded) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued '29769-7' (presentation or delivery date) associated. Both OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4] OR[one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '30956-7' (vaccine type) and one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '29768-9' (version date) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued '29769-7' (presentation or delivery date) associated. All three OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4]
IZ-45 -  If RXA-20 is valued "NA" or "RE" then ORC-3.1 SHALL be valued "9999".

IZ-23 -  If RXA-20 is valued 'CP' or 'PA' and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Administration Note.code) is '00' then the message SHALL include an OBX segment associated with the RXA with OBX-3.1 shall equal '64994-7'
IZ-25 - The value of ORC-1 (Order Control) SHALL be 'RE'.
IZ-3 - The value of EI.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-4 - The value of EI.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-5 - The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-6 - The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-5 - The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-6 - The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-28 - The value of RXA-1 (Give Sub-ID Counter) SHALL be '0'.
IZ-29 - The value of RXA-2 (Administration Sub-ID Counter) SHALL be '1'.
IZ-TS_NZ - The value of RXA-3.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
IZ-30 - If RXA-4.1 (Time) is valued, then RXA.4.1 (Time) SHALL be identical to the RXA-3.1 (Time).
IZ-49 - If the value of RXA-5.1 (Identifier) is '998', then the value of RXA-6 (Administered Amount) SHALL be '999'.
IZ-48 - If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued and the value of RXA.20 (Completion Status) is 'RE' then the value of RXA-6 (Administered Amount) SHALL be '999'.

IZ-31 - If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued and the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then the value of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: NIP001.
IZ-47 - If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not valued or the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL NOT be valued.
IZ-32 - If RXA-18.1 (Identifier) is valued then the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) SHALL be 'RE' and RXA-20 (Completion Status) SHALL be valued.
IZ-5 - The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-6 - The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-5 - The value of HD.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be formatted with ISO-compliant OID.
IZ-6 - The value of HD.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be 'ISO'.
IZ-44 - The value of OBX-4 SHALL be a positive integer.

IZ-35 - If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '64994-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: HL70064_IZ.

IZ-36 - If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '69764-9' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: PHVS_VISBarcodes_IIS.
IZ-37 - If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '30956-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: CVX.
IZ-22 - The value of OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) SHALL be 'F'.
IZ-TS_NZ - The value of OBX-14.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
IZ-44 - The value of OBX-4 SHALL be a positive integer.
